title.en: Gekiai Buzoku no Sex Language Dame Jungle de Icchau...!

altTitles.ja: 激愛部族のセックスランゲージ～だめっジャングルでイっちゃう…！

altTitles.en: The Tribe of Lovers' Sexual Language

description.en: [That's great …. you are already wet …! I will make you happier] Megumi is a student majoring in Human Culture (Anthropological Culture) at the graduate school, she agrees to investigate locally in the rainforest as persuaded by the teacher. The wish to accompany the professor made her happy for a moment, but the rainforest has many dangers. Like how when she was attacked by a wild leopard, the Baltic Kuguru clan leader saved Megumi. When they started their daily life in the village, it was the custom of men and women to bathe together …!? [Don't touch it ….] She was attacked in the most sensitive place by a powerful and gentle Baltic … Even if she knew it wouldn't be, she still wished for it … .
description.ja: 「すごい…もうこんなに濡れて…！もっと気持ちよくしてあげる」---大学院で文化人類学を専攻する恵は、教授の鶴の一声によってジャングルへ現地取材に行けることに。憧れの教授に同行♪と浮かれるのも束の間、ジャングルには危険がいっぱい！なんと野生の豹に襲われたところを、クグル族のリーダーであるバルトに助けられた恵。そして始まった村での生活では、男女は一緒に水浴びする習慣があって…!?「そんなナカまで触っちゃダメ…ッ！」たくましくて優しいバルトに、感じやすい場所ばっかり攻められて…ダメなのに、欲しくなっちゃう…ッ！
